page.title: 02CHURCH 2
page.content: are provided by several ladies of Colsterworth.The general running of Church affairs is controlled by the Rector as chairman and members of the church roll as Parochial Church Councillors.The Patronal Festival is held yearly in June and the church is decorated with floral arrangements. Funds for the church are raised by coffee mornings,newspapers, sales of home marmalade,jam,chutney and horseradish sauce. In 1985 funds were also raised by a sponsored abseil from the top of the 70'tower to the North of the church by Grantham Mountaineering club. Some 24 persons risked their necks!The proceeds were in aid of church restoration fund.The event took place on June 22nd and the weather was fair, cool with a stiff breeze.There was a good attendance and tea and refreshments were served.
